name: How 9 Military Strategy Principles Will
short_description: The use of military strategy in warfare dates back to 500 B.C. Since then, we’ve found many useful applications for military strategy—not just warfare! The essential principles of military strategy, as outlined by the United States Army Field Manuel of Military Operations, include 9 fundamental principles, and some strategists argue that following these principles guarantees victory in warfare. Each of these principles transfers to the fundamentals of business management, and can offer a unique strategy for obtaining business goals.
summary: The use of military strategy in warfare dates back to 500 B.C.
